cab.content: This document is the property of His Britannic Majesty*s GovernmentSECRET. ; QCP.168 (31) CABINET.ARMISTICE DAY .Memorandum by the Home Secretary.It will shortly he necessary to take some preliminary steps in regard to the observance of Armistice Day which falls this year on a Wednesday and I shall be glad if my Colleagues will indicate whether they wish me again to undertake the arrangements. I presume they will desire that the celebration should be on similar lines to those adopted in 1929 and 1930, but His Majesty's Pleasure will, of course, have to be ascertained before the programme is settled.J oR oC o9th July, 1931.
